Html:
Hi All,

 

I see there is some Data Visualization inside the WPF Toolkit June Release. Is it the same with Data Virtualization? If not, what is data visualization?
That is the Silverlight (and now WPF!) charting component.

Tonytam,

There is a Data Visualization assembly which includes the charting controls (the same ones found in the Silverlight Toolkit).  There is no Data Virtualization, though.  For that, you will need a third-party component or to roll your own.

Thanks!
Samantha

Hi All,

Thanks for your reply! Now I understand what it is. Many thanks again!!
